articles.author: Sarah Carter
articles.title: South Africa moves to let Putin attend BRICS summit despite ICC arrest warrant over Ukraine war - CBS News
articles.description: As a signatory to the International Criminal Court, South Africa may be obliged to arrest Putin if he sets foot in the country. Unless it can find a loophole.
articles.content: Johannesburg — The South African government has said it will extend its Diplomatic Immunity and Privileges Act to all international officials who plan to attend an August summit in the country. The c… [+4826 chars]

articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Scientists: South African Fossils Tell of the Struggle to Survive - VOA Learning English
articles.description: Scientists recently released a study about an ancient kind of animal that traveled 12,000 kilometers to survive bad weather conditions 250 million years ago.
articles.content:
A recent study says fossil remains of a top meat-eating animal living 250 million years ago, which had only been found in the worlds northern half, also lived in South Africa.
